thread.title: Dollar Rises Against Yen, As Investors Bet on BoJ Easing
thread.title_full: Dollar Rises Against Yen, As Investors Bet on BoJ Easing - WSJ

author: Ira Iosebashvili
title: Dollar Rises Against Yen, As Investors Bet on BoJ Easing
text:
The dollar rose against the yen Monday, as some investors bet the Bank of Japan would ease monetary policy at its coming meeting this week.
The dollar was recently up 0.4% at Â¥120.41. The Wall Street Journal Dollar Index, which gauges the buck against 16 currencies, was unchanged at 88.55.
Some investors believe the Bank of Japan may further loosen its monetary policy grip when it concludes its meeting on Oct. 7, given recent... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
